attributes.action: Make car insurance for young drivers cheaper.
attributes.additional_details: Insurance for a 17 year old without a black box is around £3000 per year for a young person such as my self i would struggle to pay this.
attributes.background: As a young person my self i can tell you trying to insure a car is a nightmare because the stereotype of young drivers is awful, but i can say from experience a lot of young drivers are extremely safe and we deserve a chance from insurance companies to allow is a fair price on insurance.
